verses.name: Genesis 16:7
verses.text: And the angel of the Lord found her by a fountain of water in the wilderness, by the fountain in the way to Shur.

verses.name: Genesis 16:8
verses.text: And he said, Hagar, Sarai’s maid, whence camest thou? and whither wilt thou go? And she said, I flee from the face of my mistress Sarai.

verses.name: Genesis 16:9
verses.text: And the angel of the Lord said unto her, Return to thy mistress, and submit thyself under her hands.

verses.name: Genesis 16:10
verses.text: And the angel of the Lord said unto her, I will multiply thy seed exceedingly, that it shall not be numbered for multitude.
